snippet: Mafia associates say the real-life Henry Hill played a minor role in the 1978 Kennedy Airport heist, and they disparaged him on recordings played Friday in the trial of mobster Vincent Asaro.
abstract: Audio recording played at trial of mob associate Vincent Asaro reveals Asaro and witness Gaspare Valenti downplaying participation of Henry Hill in 1978 Lufthansa heist at Kennedy International Airport; men are heard in 2012 recording saying Hill, inspiration for Ray Liotta's character in movie Goodfellas, was given too much credit for his role in crime.
lead_paragraph: Mafia associates say the real-life Henry Hill played a minor role in the 1978 Kennedy Airport heist, and they disparaged him on recordings played Friday in the trial of mobster Vincent Asaro.

headline.print_headline: Court Hears Tapes Saying ‘Goodfellas’ Got It Wrong
headline.main: Gangsters Insult ‘Goodfellas’ Character Henry Hill in Lufthansa Trial Recordings
